languages.text: Until the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20.
languages.original_text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g} все союзники, которые атаковали под действием Последнего рывка, получают штраф −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}.

До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика все союзники, которые атаковали под действием Последнего рывка, получают штраф −20 к Дальнему Бою и Ближнему Бою.

languages.text: 所有参与{g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}最终齐射{/g}的盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会降低20点，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。
languages.original_text: Until the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text: 所有参与最终齐射的盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会降低20，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

languages.text: Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}, todos los aliados que hayan atacado como parte de {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Salva final{/g} reducen en −20 su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}, todos los aliados que hayan atacado como parte de Salva final reducen en −20 su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} gilt, dass alle Verbündeten, die als Teil von {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Letzte Salve{/g} angegriffen haben, eine um −20 reduzierte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} erleiden.
languages.original_text: Until the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} gilt, dass alle Verbündeten, die als Teil von Letzte Salve angegriffen haben, eine um −20 reduzierte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} erleiden.

languages.text: Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, une réduction de −20 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de tous les alliés qui ont attaqué dans le cadre de {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Dernière salve{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, une réduction de −20 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de tous les alliés qui ont attaqué dans le cadre de Dernière salve.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、最後の斉射の一員として攻撃したすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}が−20減少する。
languages.original_text: Until the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies that attacked as part of Last Volley have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、最後の斉射の一員として攻撃したすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}が−20減少する。

languages.text: {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Son Salvo{/g} kabiliyetinin parçası olarak saldıran tüm dost birimlerin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri 20 puan azalır. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen'ın{/g} bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başına dek sürer.
